message: Let's be fair, Bob. A slightly better deal for me to account for the inflation, but we both win big.
I'll take the bigger share this time, since the money is worth less to you now.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. We'll both lose out to inflation if this drags on. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest solution.
The longer we play, the less your share is worth. I'll take a bit more this time.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to compromise. Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at our potential gains any further.
Inflation is taking a big bite out of your share. I think it's time for me to take a bigger piece of the pie.
